name: Dino Spin
description:
Vote for this game for the Ludum dare 46!

Dino Spin is a fun and challenging adventure where you help our little friend Dino take his Dino Eggs to their nests. You can play with over 20+ different levels, and challenge yourself to collect coins for bonus score! Can you save them all? Good luck, and don't drop the egg!

  • Audio: Dugas
  • Art: Doctor Gear
  • Code: Relixes
